title: Private Sins
description: Kelly was in deep trouble; her husband was a pastor and she his loyal first lady. Well she wasâ€¦until she had an affair with Chris; the first elder of their church. And now she was pregnant with his child. Could she keep the secret from her husband and pretend that all was well? Or should she confess her private sin and let the chips fall where they may?
author: Brenda Barrett
